notifText.message:
One or more streams detected.
Use the right-click context menu to copy the URL(s).

notifIncompCopiedText.message:
Use of youtube-dl is recommended.
Stream URL(s) copied in plain form due to lack of compatibility with the chosen tool:

extText.message: Formerly known as HLS Stream Detector. Detects M3U8/MPD/F4M/ISM playlists and VTT subtitles used by HLS/DASH/HDS/MSS streams. Assembles readymade youtube-dl (recommended)/FFmpeg/Streamlink commands.
